title: (3) Hager 3550 ARC Entry/Office Lever Lock - Grade 2 - Fire Rated
item_description:
(3) Hager 3550 ARC Entry/Office Lever Lock - Grade 2 - Fire Rated

Seller States: Retail over $100 each

Hager 3550 Entry/Office Lever Lock, ARC Archer Lever Design, Satin Chrome Finish

Hager 3500 Series Grade 2 lock provides a perfect combination of value and performance and is the ideal choice of lock for typical commercial applications. It is an economical alternative to Grade 1 when Grade 1 is not required.

Hager 3550 Entry/Office Function (ANSI F82A) – Deadlocking latchbolt operated by lever from either side except when outside lever is locked by push button on inside lever. When outside lever is locked, operating key in outside lever or operating inside lever unlocks push button and retracts latchbolt. Closing door does not release push button.

  • US26D satin chrome finish
  • door prep – 2-3/4″ diameter (cross bore), latch hole – 1″ diameter (edge bore)
  • No exposed mounting screws
